name: rspec
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wral(s0, c0, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
-| wral(s0, c0, w0)
-| wi(wral(s0, c0, w0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
-| wral(s0, c0, w0)
-| wi(wral(s0, c0, w0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))

body.origin: |- wi(wral(s0, c0, w0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
-| wral(s0, c0, w0)

comment: Specialization rule for restricted quantification. (Contributed by NM, 19-Nov-1994.)
